Game.Name: Viva! Las Vegas (Japan)
Game.plot: Bring a casino home to your living room! Up to four high-rollers can play Blackjack, Roulette, Keno, or Slot Machines. Odds are you are going to love VEGAS DREAM!Cheat: Cheat ModeStart the game and on the gambling game select screen, press Up, Down, Right, Left, Up, Down, Right, Left, A, B, A, B & B. A sound will be heard if you did it right. Now, if you hold A & B and press Start, you'll enter a "Message Test" mode. You can also hold A and press Start on Blackjack to see the game's ending, on Roulette to play a lucky slot machine, on Slot Machine to for a Face Test and on Keno for a soundtest.Cheat: Misc. PasswordsOn the password enter screen, enter the codes below:
Game.Notes: Viva! Las Vegas (ビバ ラスベガス) is a gambling video game produced for the Nintendo Entertainment System and developed by HAL Laboratory that was released in 1988.
